page.title: 13Biddestone Broadsheet
page.content: The Biddestone Broadsheet is a free illustrated monthly newsletter which is delivered monthly to every house in the parish of Biddestone & Slaughterford. It is supported by voluntary contributions from readers, the parish council and the village fete committee. The aim is to give everyone a sense of involvement in a community which perhaps is more fragmented than it was a generation ago, when people were more interdependent. The Broadsheet is edited by a commmittee of seven.News is given of "what's on", births, marriages, deaths and moves in and out of the village. The parish council,school, W.I. etc. report on their activities and there are regular nature notes.
